name: UNShowPreviewsSetting
desc: Constants indicating the style previewing a notification's content.

items.name: case always
items.desc: The notification's content is always shown, even when the device is locked.

items.name: case whenAuthenticated
items.desc: The notification's content is shown only when the device is unlocked.

items.name: case never
items.desc: The notification's content is never shown, even when the device is unlocked
